head.title: Nintendo Says Profit Rose 25% in 6 Months

hedline.hl1: Nintendo Says Profit Rose 25% in 6 Months

block.p: The Nintendo Company said yesterday that its pretax profit for the six months through Sept. 30 rose 25 percent from the corresponding period a year earlier. Nintendo, a Japanese video-game maker, reported pretax profit of 63.87 billion yen, or about $629 million, compared with 51.05 billion yen a year earlier. The company's sales totaled 135.19 billion yen in the latest period, a 19 percent decline from 166.1 billion yen.
The company had nonoperating profits of 26 billion yen in the latest period, most of which came from revenue earned from foreign exchange operations.
